displayName.text: New York Eye & Retina Specialists Manhattan

formattedAddress: 230 Central Park S Suite 1F, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 230 Central Park S Suite 1F, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Samer Khosrof and all of his staff are amazing! I had such terrible vision and an astigmatism. Although other doctors could not get my prescription correct, Dr. Samer was able to help me obtain 20/15 vision with LASIK. His warmth and depth of expertise are unparalleled. His incredibly knowledgeable and kind staff, especially Anwar, Fatima, and Aziza, make every visit a truly wonderful experience. Thank you for all that you do for your patients!

text.text: Dr. Samer Khosrof and all of his staff are amazing! I had such terrible vision and an astigmatism. originalText.text: Dr Samar Khosrof and his staff, especially Anwar have been instrumental in my LASIK journey. Through their work I was able to achieve 20/10 vision post operation. They are such amazing, patient and kind-hearted people and I would recommend them to anyone who may consider doing LASIK. Thank you again guys!! :)

text.text: Dr Samar Khosrof and his staff, especially Anwar have been instrumental in my LASIK journey. Through their work I was able to achieve 20/10 vision post operation. They are such amazing, patient and kind-hearted people and I would recommend them to anyone who may consider doing LASIK. Thank you again guys!! :)

originalText.text: 100% recommend Dr. Samer to anyone looking for an Ophthalmologist. Dr. Samer and all the team members are truly the best. They are super friendly, professional, and overall great at what they do. After 20ish years of wearing glasses, I finally was able to correct my vision with EVO ICL. Thank you Dr. Samer and everyone in the team for making it possible!!!

text.text: 100% recommend Dr. Samer to anyone looking for an Ophthalmologist. Dr. Samer and all the team members are truly the best. They are super friendly, professional, and overall great at what they do. After 20ish years of wearing glasses, I finally was able to correct my vision with EVO ICL. Thank you Dr. Samer and everyone in the team for making it possible!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Samer and his entire staff were absolutely incredible! I started having horrible eye issues several months ago, and he was so attentive, knowledgeable, and honest.  Rather than making quick judgments (which the other ophthalmologists I had seen were doing), Dr. Samer sent me for a myriad of tests to get to the root cause of the issue. He never pressured me to get lasik because he put the health of my eyes at the forefront of everything he did. It was only after several months and ensuring we had properly treated the underlying issue that he even allowed me to consider getting lasik. Although I was nervous, both Dr. Samer and his staff spent time explaining the process, telling me about their own experiences, and helping me figure out the best course of action for my particular circumstances.  They told me there was no rush and assured me they would be here if I did decide that was the right decision for me. When I did decide to do lasik, they calmed my nerves, made sure I felt comfortable, and one of the staff members even held my hand during the procedure! As an added bonus, their office was absolutely stunning (truly the most beautiful office I have ever been in)! Getting lasik with Dr. Samer was the best decision I have ever made! My siblings and cousins are now all talking about getting lasik with him now too because they are so impressed with what an incredible experience I had with him! Thank you for your amazing service and for improving my quality of life!!
